context: People make a lot of noise over these transits.  They've been happening for decades.  During the Cold War the Soviet Union practically parked "trawlers" at sea all through the Med, Atlantic and Pacific near naval ports to keep tabs on US/NATO movements.  The game hasn't changed.  China anteed in to play a few hands.

Everything the West has done is consistent with that policy, which is still the agreement to this day. China's warlike attitude toward a small island that is meaningless to them is the root of the problem. The Chinese communists are fanatics and made up of criminals, gangsters and murderers, especially at the top with Xi and his friends. They want Taiwan so they can further expand and threaten other freer countries all along their coastline.
